entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CarouselView with GestureRecognisers for Tapped or Clicked stop being able to scroll. #9664
  • Binding to hexColor doesn't work. #9662
  • [Proposal] Staggered Layout for CollectionView #9659
  • Setting IsBusy causes exception/crash #9658
  • TapGestureRecognizer Secondary ButtonMask only sort of works for Android #9653
    Backlog
  • Machine hangs while building a .NET MAUI App - Observed even in a basic project created from the template #9652
  • Separate shell navigation query attribute abstractions into net6.0 project #9649
    Backlog
  • ApplyToDerivedTypes not working for implicit styles #9648
    Backlog
  • Shell.Current.Navigation.PushAsync Null Reference Exception #9647
    Backlog
  • [Android] Window overlay is not working with Shell #9646
    Backlog

Closed

  • Spaces in static files in the main project or in a Razor Class Library cause the image to not load #9481
    .NET 8 Planning
  • SQLiteConnection: "System.DllNotFoundException: 'e_sqlite3'" #9651
  • Maui showing this when building #9528
  • resource raw/ca (aka com.companyname.gestorordenadores.client.maui:raw/ca) not found #9602
  • [MacCatalyst] Button's appearance does not look good after building an application with adopted Mac idiom #7782
    .NET 7
  • Fail to install MAUI from main branch with error "microsoft.net.workload.emscripten.manifest-6.0.300.msi.x64::6.0.9 is not found in NuGet feeds" #9625
  • Unhandled Exception when closing app on Windows #9644
  • WCAG 2.5.5: Touch inputs must have a sufficient target size. (android.widget.Button) #6597
    .NET 7
  • ClearButtonVisibility is not working #6360
    6.0-servicing
  • Right click gesture recognizer #9140
    7.0-rc1
  • Add missing MAUI API docs #7463
  • Colors render as black #9292

PullRequests

Created

  • Obsolete OpenGLView #9660
  • Blazor Hybrid CSS Hot Reload Fixes #9645
    area/blazor 🕸️

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9618
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix typo in ScrollToRequest.cs #9661
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589
    area/Xaml </>
  • Display orientation should not use window size #9641
    platform/windows 🪟, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [main][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9619
    community ✨, 7.0-rc1
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.13.2.1 to 4.13.2.2 #9317
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22418.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22419.4 #9577
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [net6.0][Tizen] Replace Tizen Backend engine #9620
    community ✨, partner/tizen
  • Implement PointerGestureRecognizer #9592
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Remove GetEffectiveFlowDirection and defer flow direction handling to platforms #9558
  • Enable Window Sizing #4942
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • [ci] Add support to net6.0 for multi-targeting in VS #9642
  • Windows message loop manager #9614
    platform/windows 🪟, area/lifecycle 🔁, area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
